publicwhip.spmotion: * S3M-5788 Bill Kidd: Glasgow to Host 2010 Cerebral Palsy European Football Championships—That the Parliament welcomes the news that Glasgow is to host the 2010 Cerebral Palsy European Football Championships, which are to take place in the last two weeks of August; notes that the event will be held at the new Regional Football Centre in Toryglen and will feature 10 European national teams; applauds the Cerebral Palsy International Sports and Recreation Association (CPISRA) in organising the event, and looks forward to a very successful competition.

S3M-5788 Glasgow to Host 2010 Cerebral Palsy European Football Championships (lodged on 19 February 2010) Pauline McNeill*, Kenneth Gibson*, Stuart McMillan*, John Park*, Rob Gibson*, Aileen Campbell*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Bill Wilson*, Anne McLaughlin*, Robin Harper*, Elaine Smith*, Bob Doris*, Michael Matheson*, Gil Paterson*, Bill Aitken*
S3M-5788 Glasgow to Host 2010 Cerebral Palsy European Football Championships (lodged on 19 February 2010) Hugh O’Donnell*, Jamie Hepburn*, Dave Thompson*
S3M-5788 Glasgow to Host 2010 Cerebral Palsy European Football Championships (lodged on 19 February 2010) Brian Adam*, Trish Godman*
